Portfolio

Project Portfolio

A sample of projects from my undergraduate and graduate careers

LEGO Robotics
Web-Based Programming Hub

Designed a system to allow a classroom of students to easily connect to LEGO EV3s and program the EV3s in python through a web browser

Low Cost
Fatigue Testing Machine

Designed and built a fatigue testing machine for a startup company in India that manufactures modular roofing tiles for slum and village homes

Intravitreal Drug Delivery Device

Co-Invented a surgical device used to inject drugs into a patient’s ocular cavity (International Patent Application Publication No. WO2019018367A1)
